lyrics:
These days, well they're lookin' up
We got, so much to say
We got, someone to love
We got, good friends
They're so good to us
And haters can hate
And fakers can front

And so we try to live
Like it's all we've got
'Cause for all we know
This could be the last night of our lives
Gonna chase down our every desire
We blaze the night
With all we've been waiting for
All this time
Reaches such great heights
Gives us just one perfect night
To say oh what a beautiful life
Oh oh oh
Oh what a beautiful life

Here it comes out of the dark
We've got nothing to fear
We've got nothing but heart
Can't just wait here
To see what it brings
We've got too many hopes
We've got too many dreams

And so we try to live
Like it's all we've got
'Cause for all we know
This could be the last night of our lives
Gonna chase down our every desire
We blaze the night
With all we've been waiting for
All this time
Reaches such great heights
Gives us just one perfect night
To say oh what a beautiful life

Oh, oh, oh
Oh what a beautiful life

Last night of our lives
Gonna chase down our every desire
We blaze the night
With all we've been waiting for
All this time
Reaches such great heights
Give us just one perfect night
To say oh what a beautiful life

The last night of our lives
Gonna chase down our every desire
We blaze the night
With all we've been waiting for
All this time
Reaches such great heights
Gives us just one perfect night
To say oh what a beautiful life
Oh what a beautiful life
Beautiful life
Oh what a beautiful life
Oh, oh, oh
Oh, what a beautiful life
